org.objectstyle.cayenne.exp
Class EvalExpression

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.exp.ExpressionTraversal
        |
        +--org.objectstyle.cayenne.exp.EvalExpression
Deprecated. since 1.0.6 expressions evaluation has been reimplemented, and this class is no longer supported (with all its current defficiencies). Use API provided by Expression class to do in-memory evaluation.

public class EvalExpression
extends ExpressionTraversal

Class that performs in-memory Cayenne expressions evaluation.

Author:
Andrei Adamchik
